import React, { lazy,useContext,useEffect } from 'react' import { CBadge, CButton, CButtonGroup, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CProgress, CRow, CCallout } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import ProgrammeProvider from "../../context/ProgrammeContext" import Paginations from "../../pagination/pagination" import SearchInput from "../../inputs/search-input" import MainChartExample from '../charts/MainChartExample.js' const styles={ noBorder:{ border:"none" }, noBorderTop:{ borderBTop:"none" }, cardStyle:{ boxShadow: " 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2)", transition: "0.3s", border:"none" } } const DashboardProgrammes = () => { const {setCurrentPage,fetchProgrammesApi,pagination,programmes}=useContext(ProgrammeProvider.Context) useEffect(()=>{ fetchProgrammesApi() // setCurrentPage(1) //alert("mount") },[]) return ( <> All Posts | Showing Page ({programmes.length ? pagination.current_page:""}) of ({programmes.length ? pagination.total: "" }) Results { programmes.length ? programmes.map((post)=>( )):null }
Title Attendees Category Type
{post.name}
 {post.data.length}
{!programmes.length &&

No articles found

} {programmes.length ? : "" } ) } export default DashboardProgrammes
